h2_title: The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines
content: There are two Luojia Fragrant Vines to find in Chapter 3. You can, however, head back to the Monkey in the Marsh of the White Mist to purchase more once you start this chapter.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md", within the section "Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations" and the sub-section "The New West Luojia Fragrant Vines". The content is presented below:

There are two Luojia Fragrant Vines to find in Chapter 3. You can, however, head back to the Monkey in the Marsh of the White Mist to purchase more once you start this chapter.
